section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibrahim bin Muhammad that:He heard his father narrating that he heard Aishah say: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) would not omit four rak'ahs before Zuhr and two rak'ahs before Fajr
